specific_parameters._comment_required: The following parameters are REQUIRED for Roshambo to work:
specific_parameters._comment_rdbase: Path to your RDKit build directory. Update this for your system.
specific_parameters._comment_conda_env: Name of conda environment with Roshambo installed. Update this for your system.
specific_parameters._comment_ref_file: Path to reference SDF file. Update this for your system.
specific_parameters._comment_conda_base: Path to conda installation. Leave as null for auto-detection.
specific_parameters._comment_weights: Weights for shape and color similarity (should sum to 1.0).
specific_parameters._comment_n_confs: Number of conformers to generate. 0 means use existing conformers.
specific_parameters._comment_overlays: Set save_overlays to true to save molecular overlays.
specific_parameters._comment_debug: Enable debug output to help diagnose issues.
specific_parameters._comment_protac: For PROTAC design, you can also specify multiple reference files:
